name: AbyssydA
description:
Abyssyda is a cheerful cooperative sidescroller, 2 players arcade game with split-screen and single-keyboard controls, just like in the old nostalgic days. Take on the role of an astronaut or a diver, dodge obstacles, collect resources with your partner and try to survive as long as possible.

The main feature of the cooperative is that in order to increase health and points, both partners need to catch the same item, so players need to work together.

Non-commercial game that was made during a 2 days GameJam.

Enjoy <3

Made by:

https://iron-games.itch.io/

https://andrey-aleks.itch.io/
